td.content: s:a white M aged 74 ys presents with increased mild increased urination and mild excessive thirst over 10 months. he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 66 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, appears in NAD a:Type 2 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed AVANDIA - 4 mg daily, and ordered Glucose 2hr Post Dose.
